metadata.title: CVE-2020-15153 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Ampache before version 4.2.2 allows unauthenticated users to perform SQLinjection. Refer to the referenced GitHub Security Advisory for details anda workaround. This is fixed in version 4.2.2 and the development branch.

criterions.comment: ampache: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
